entry.title: How a Tiny Crew Struck a Blow Against China With a Wooden Boat and a Knife
entry.content: When the Chinese coast guard put up a barrier in the South China Sea, the Philippines devised a plan to retaliate.

entry.title: 'I'm Alive but I Feel Dead': Inside an Exodus Decades in the Making
entry.content: Russia, distracted by the war in Ukraine, stood aside as Azerbaijan seized control of the long-disputed Nagorno-Karabakh region.

entry.title: $67 Billion of Rare Minerals Is Buried Under One of the World's Biggest Carbon Sinks
entry.content: A fight is brewing in Canada about how, or whether, to dig out materials essential for EV batteries that lie deep beneath vast peat bogs.
